title: This leading PDF management tool is now under $25 and helps users edit, convert, and more
content:
Macworld

PDFs are the preferred file type for many business purposes because they’re small, ready to print, and easy to send. However, if you have to make any changes to them, they become a bear to work with. That’s why you need a PDF management tool like PDF Converter Pro, which you can get on sale now through January 28.

PDF Converter Pro is an all-in-one PDF creation and management tool that allows you to convert many popular file types into PDFs or vice versa in just a few clicks. You can edit PDFs, organize them, password-protect them, and merge and split them.  

You can even extract specifics like text or images from PDFs, making it handy for students and professionals alike. With its wide abilities and simple-to-use tools, it’s no surprise that PDF Converter Pro earned a 4.4 out of 5-star rating on Trustpilot.

Streamline the way you work with PDFs this year and beyond.

You have until January 28 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific to get a lifetime license to PDF Converter Pro for just $24.97. No coupon needed.
